0.text:
Who are you? You shouldn't sneak up on someone in the middle of a forest filled with those slimes.
 I might trust you if you go and kill some slimes. I saw 2 deeper in the forest and 1 by the cave entrance.

1.text: I still don't trust you. Go kill those slimes first.

2.text:
Fine, you seem trustworthy enough. There's a town through that cave entrance, 
head through there and you should reach Thalud. Good Luck.

0.text: Thank you for saving me, find me in my shop in Thalud and I can hook you up with some better gear.

1.text: I'll see you in the city.

0.text:
I don't know if I can do this. They are just becoming more and more of a problem. 
Advisor Jax: Maybe you should hire a mercenary, the guards obviously aren't handling this correctly. 
 Jarl Yassef: You're right... hold there, you seem like a mercenary with that get-up how would you like to help Thalud? 
Would you help use take care of these rebels?

1.text: Thank you, I'll pay you when the threat is handled. And only then.

2.text: Thank you for handling the threat to my town. Here your gold for your work.

0.text: I am the advisor to the Jarl. Nice to meet you.
